thread.title: Globo refutes allegations made by Quintessential Capital
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Globo refutes allegations made by Quintessential Capital | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Globo refutes allegations made by Quintessential Capital
text:
Oct 23 Globo Plc :
* Response to share price movements
* Group is aware of a report published last night by an organisation called Quintessential Capital Management in the United States
* Globo completely refutes all allegations made in this report (Bengaluru Newsroom +91 80 6749 1136)
